description.name: eurcbase
description.tagline: EURC base Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto base-eurc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept EURC base directly on your website
Unique base/eurc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your base/eurc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
